ygData.subject: Re: Andena Bonsante(Zebuxoruk) and Kittyinathong(Tunare)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hope you continue here even after repairs. Glad to see someone on the Zeb server. Barto Proudfoot Lvl 36 Halfling Druid Zeb
ygData.messageBody:
Hope you continue here even after repairs. Glad to see someone on the
Zeb server.

Barto Proudfoot
Lvl 36 Halfling Druid
Zeb

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "arwen1964 <arwen1964@i...>"
<arwen1964@i...> wrote:
> Hello all. Nice to find a temporary substitute for EQ while I wait
> impatiently for repairs to the latest botched EQ download. AB is a
> level 26 HE cleric and Kitty is a level 5 BST. Call on AB for a rez
> if you see me. Kitty is busy looting in CB on Tunare server. Any
> clerics who want bronze bricks just give a holler. Also anyone
> needing crush belts...I have a bag for sale...10pp.
> AB and Kitty
